name: The Minimalist (Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3)
description:
The Minimalist was made for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3.

**Download for best performance**

Remove all items in each room in the least amount of steps possible before exiting the room. 

WASD to move.

All assets were made by coreylr197.

Font used is "Foglihten No. 01" by gluck.
